info.report-description: LTE QoS measurement (M8026) measures QoS related indicators per cell. This includes packet loss, packet drop, packet delay, IP latency, throughput, and number of average Ues (cf, 32.425, 4.4) For MCC/MNC primary PLMN-id shall be used.

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_5 (M8026C0)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 5 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_6 (M8026C1)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 6 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_7 (M8026C2)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 7 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_8 (M8026C3)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 8 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_9 (M8026C4)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 9 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_QCI_5 (M8026C5)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 5 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_QCI_6 (M8026C6)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 6 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_QCI_7 (M8026C7)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 7 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_QCI_8 (M8026C8)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 8 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_QCI_9 (M8026C9)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 9 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DELAY_MEAN_QCI_1 (M8026C10)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average (arithmetic mean) PDCP SDU delay for QCI 1 data on the downlink. UPDATED: The measurement is updated with each successfully transmitted PDCP SDU containing data for QCI 1. The delay of a single PDCP SDU is the difference between the point in time when the PDCP SDU arrives at PDCP upper SAP and the point in time when the last piece of PDCP SDU was received by the UE according to received HARQ feedback information. PDCP SDUs for which HARQ acknowledgement is not received for all parts shall not be included in the calculation.

kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average (arithmetic mean) PDCP SDU delay for QCI 2 data on the downlink. UPDATED: The measurement is updated with each successfully transmitted PDCP SDU containing data for QCI 2. The delay of a single PDCP SDU is the difference between the point in time when the PDCP SDU arrives at PDCP upper SAP and the point in time when the last piece of PDCP SDU was received by the UE according to received HARQ feedback information. PDCP SDUs for which HARQ acknowledgement is not received for all parts shall not be included in the calculation.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DL_QCI_5 (M8026C19)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of transmitted PDCP SDUs in downlink for QCI 5 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU of a QCI 5 bearer is sent to the UE.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DL_QCI_6 (M8026C20)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of transmitted PDCP SDUs in downlink for QCI 6 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU of a QCI 6 bearer is sent to the UE.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DL_QCI_7 (M8026C21)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of transmitted PDCP SDUs in downlink for QCI 7 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU of a QCI 7 bearer is sent to the UE.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DL_QCI_8 (M8026C22)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of transmitted PDCP SDUs in downlink for QCI 8 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU of a QCI 8 bearer is sent to the UE.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DL_QCI_9 (M8026C23)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of transmitted PDCP SDUs in downlink for QCI 9 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU of a QCI 9 bearer is sent to the UE.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_UL_QCI_5 (M8026C24)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of received PDCP SDUs for QCI 5 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU for a QCI 5 bearer is delivered to higher layers.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_UL_QCI_6 (M8026C25)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of received PDCP SDUs for QCI 6 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU for a QCI 6 bearer is delivered to higher layers.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_UL_QCI_7 (M8026C26)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of received PDCP SDUs for QCI 7 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU for a QCI 7 bearer is delivered to higher layers.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_UL_QCI_8 (M8026C28)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of received PDCP SDUs for QCI 8 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU for a QCI 8 bearer is delivered to higher layers.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_UL_QCI_9 (M8026C29)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of received PDCP SDUs for QCI 9 bearers. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU for a QCI 9 bearer is delivered to higher layers.

kpi_info.title: HARQ_DURATION_QCI1_AVG (M8026C30)
kpi_info.use: The counter provides the average time for HARQ transmissions of QCI 1 data during one measurement period. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when the eNB received feedback (ACK/NACK) from the UE for a HARQ transmission of QCI 1 data. Round trip times for PDCP SDUs (or parts thereof), which could not be completely sent, must not be included in the calculation.

kpi_info.use: The counter provides the average time for HARQ transmissions of QCI 2 data during one measurement period. UPDATED: The counter is incremented when the eNB received feedback (ACK/NACK) from the UE for a HARQ transmission of QCI 2 data. Round trip times for PDCP SDUs (or parts thereof), which could not be completely sent, must not be included in the calculation.

Round trip times for PDCP SDUs (or parts thereof), which could not be completely sent, must not be included in the calculation.

kpi_info.use: The counter provides the average time for HARQ transmissions of QCI 4 data during one measurement period. kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_FNA (M8026C254)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_1_FNA (M8026C255)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 1 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_2_FNA (M8026C256)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 2 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_3_FNA (M8026C257)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 3 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_UL_QCI_4_FNA (M8026C258)
kpi_info.use: Number of missing UL PDCP packets of a data bearer with QCI = 4 that are not delivered to higher layers. Missing packets are identified by the missing PDCP sequence number. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a missing UL PDCP sequence number is detected.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_FNA (M8026C259)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_QCI_1_FNA (M8026C260)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 1 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 2 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_LOSS_DL_QCI_4_FNA (M8026C263)
kpi_info.use: Number of DL PDCP SDUs of a data radio bearer with QCI = 4 that could not be successfully transmitted. Only user-plane traffic (DTCH) is considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when a part of that PDCP SDU has been transmitted over the air but not positively acknowledged, and it was decided that no more transmission attempts will be done. If the transmission of a packet might continue in another cell, it shall not be included in this count. (HO case)

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
